## Installation

Install the current release from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=mixnet):

```{r,eval=FALSE}
install.packages("mixnet")
```

or the latest development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/rauschenberger/mixnet):

```{r,eval=FALSE}
#install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rauschenberger/mixnet")
```

Armin Rauschenberger and Enrico Glaab (2019).
"Improved elastic net regression through stacked generalisation".
*Manuscript in preparation.*
